item.title: Soulja Boy Arrested on Weapons Charge During Traffic Stop
item.description: Soulja Boy is facing some serious legal headaches as a result of an early morning traffic stop. The “Crank That (Soulja Boy)” rapper was a passenger in a car that was pulled over at Melros
